Title: Frontend Developer
Description:
HouzeGuru is a young startup re-imagining the future of organized living by developing tools and platforms for Families to organize their lives better. We aspire to be India's 1st integrated intelligent home assistant for indian families. HouzeGuru, our inaugural flagship offering is a mobile app for both Android and iOS users. Please visit our website www.Houzeguru.com for more details.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Utilize Flutter and Dart to develop innovative mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
2. Implement APIs to ensure seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
3. Collaborate with the design team using Figma to create visually stunning user interfaces.
4. Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure high performance and reliability of applications.
5. Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve development processes.
6. Assist in project planning and execution to meet deadlines and deliver exceptional results.
7. Contribute creative ideas and solutions to enhance the overall user experience of our products.

If you are a motivated self-starter with a strong foundation in frontend development, this internship opportunity is perfect for you! Apply now and be part of our dynamic team at HouzeGuru.

Title: Frontend Developer - NextJS
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Developing responsive and scalable web applications using React.js and Next.js
2. Interacting with REST APIs, specifically state management, for data handling and local storage.
3. Building and testing applications to ensure functionality and performance.
4. Documenting code, processes, and troubleshooting steps for future reference.

Title: Junior Frontend Developer
Description:
About the role:

We are looking for a passionate and motivated Junior Frontend Developer to join our team. If you have 1-2 years of experience, or you're a fresher with a B.Tech degree and a strong grasp of frontend technologies, we'd love to hear from you.

You will mainly be working on the design and development of our AI image generation startup's website anisht.com. This is a hybrid role, with flexible in-office hours to be discussed during the interview process.

Key responsibilities:

1. Develop and maintain web applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and React.
2. Collaborate with designers, backend developers, and product managers to implement features and improve usability.
3. Write clean, maintainable code and follow best practices for frontend development.
4. Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging.
5. Stay up to date with emerging technologies and frameworks.

Required skills:

1. Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
2. Working knowledge of React.
3. Basic understanding of TypeScript or willingness to learn.
4. Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
5. Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
6. Ability to work independently and in a collaborative team environment.
7. Strong communication and a willingness to learn and adapt.

Hiring process

Application review
Shortlisting
Skill test (for shortlisted candidates)
Technical interview
Final discussion/offer

Title: Webflow Developer
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Design & development: Translate designs (often from Figma or other design tools) into functional and visually appealing websites using Webflow.
2. Responsive design: Ensure websites are responsive and provide a seamless user experience across various devices and browsers.
3. Webflow CMS: Set up, customize, and manage Webflow CMS collections.

Title: Business Developer
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Identify and engage potential clients in need of web development, branding, SEO, paid ads, or social media services
2. Create and pitch tailored proposals to clients based on their business goals
3. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships
4. Collaborate with the tech and marketing teams to create service packages and campaign strategies
5. Attend client meetings, networking events, webinars, and virtual summits to promote the brand
6. Research market trends, competitor offerings, and new platforms for lead generation
7. Manage and update CRM with leads, progress, and conversion data
8. Meet and exceed monthly/quarterly sales targets and KPIs
9. Contribute to shaping sales processes, pricing strategies, and service positioning
